verbs.description: [ARG1: uk poison suspect] [V: is] [ARG2: doctor for russian intelligence one of the two suspects in the poisoning of an ex - spy in england is a doctor who works for russian military intelligence and traveled to britain under an alias investigative group bellingcat] reported monday bellingcat said on its website that the man british authorities identified as alexander petrov is actually alexander mishkin a doctor working for the russian military intelligence unit known as gru british officials said when they charged two russians last month in the march nerve agent attack on sergei skripal and his daughter that they believed petrov was an assumed name england intelligence sergei skripal alexander petrov london salisbury russian britain ukraine gru doctor russian navy poison dr alexander yevgenyevich mishkin nerve agent uk bellingcat
